entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
